short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate battery drain time based on capacity and current draw

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The 9M2PJU Drain Calculator is your go-to tool for estimating battery life based on capacity and current draw. Perfect for hobbyists, engineers, and anyone who relies on battery-powered devices, this extension simplifies the process of calculating how long your batteries will last under specific usage conditions.

If you enjoy using this extension and would like to support its development, consider buying me a coffee! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/9m2pju 

Features:

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design for easy input of battery capacity (mAh), current drain (mA), and efficiency factor (%).
Accurate Calculations: Provides precise estimates for battery life based on your input parameters, including the ability to factor in efficiency loss.
Real-Time Results: Quickly calculate the expected drain time with just a few clicks.
Lightweight and Fast: Designed to operate smoothly without slowing down your browser.

Whether you're planning a project, managing energy consumption, or simply curious about your battery usage, the 9M2PJU Drain Calculator is the perfect companion.

Download now and take the guesswork out of battery management!
